examples.example: 爷爷总是绘声绘色地给我讲那些有趣的故事。

translate.english: Grandpa always vividly tells me those interesting stories.

examples.example: 老师用生动的语言给我们讲述了一个充满哲理的故事。

translate.english: The teacher told us a philosophical story with vivid language.

examples.example: 我喜欢在闲暇时光阅读各种精彩的故事来丰富自己的精神世界。

translate.english: I like to read various wonderful stories in my spare time to enrich my spiritual world.
